nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi ,  My dad is on the 8th floor right now waiting for infusion #3. We have an apt with Dr Person3 tmrw at 9:10. He has two new growths on his right shin and a spot on his left thigh that Dr Person4 circled at the beginning of MM/DD/YYYY. Can anyone see him today while he is there? My brother Person1 is with my dad today. Thank you, Person2 XXX-XXX-XXXX
